name: TapeKnight
description:
Game done for Brackeys GameJam2020.2 and the theme was Rewind. After playing the game, you will wish that you have a real life rewind mechanic, to teleport you back to before you have ever played this game.

Rewind is in the games story, there is also a movement rewind mechanic and rewind after each run.

We know the game is not finished, but we hope that you like what we have done so far. 

And please don't be mad because of few hidden mechanics :)
